choices: She wakes up on her own
She's dreaming and is getting horny...
1.content: You frown as you feel something on you while you lay in bed, slowly waking up. You open your eyes and see Senna missing from where she laid down last night. "Not again." You chuckle. You lift up the bed sheets, sure enough, there she is, snoring away on you muscular chest, spread eagle with a content smile on her face. "Hmm, should I wake her up?"
1.title: Waking up.

11.content: As you look at her, you smile. "As fun as this is, I should get her up. We have a busy day today." You contemplate how to get her up.
11.title: Yes

choices: She wakes up but has a small hangover
12.content: As you her her snore louder, you recall her coming home from her girls night out, how she was so drunk you had to make her go to bed. "Awww, she could use the rest, it'll help her recover from last night." Unlike humans, goblins are able to fight hangovers by getting a good nights sleep. A couple hours roll by
12.title: No

13.content: Senna soon yawns and groggily opens her eyes. "Mmm, morning hun." She says tiredly, kissing your lips softly. Rolling off you, she flops onto her side of the bed. Grinning you look at her. "Have a fun night at your Mom's?" Groaning she grabs her head. "Ugh, not so loud, she gave me some of her homebrew." Whistling, you raise a eyebrow. " Tanya's homemade goblin ale? That stuff would kill a human, not to mention a minotaur and dragon, no wonder you feel like crap." Nodding she slowly slides off the bed. "You want a shower or coffee babe?" You ask as you see her naked little green body go into her closet.
13.title: She wakes up on her own

She's 4ft tall, has a 48g cup breast, slighty muscular, wide hips, cuppable ass, light green skin, short black hair with pink highlights, purple eyes, plush green lips and has a trimmed pussy. She, like many of the fantasy girls in this world, has a high sex drive and is madly in love with you.

Feel free to add on to the story, nothing hardcore or extreme though, this is a romantic story.
